The group "BENKOLA" is composed of six married men averaging 52 years of age and four children each, all living in polygamous families in Cercle de BOUGOUNI (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The men are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their rainy season farm work. They are on their second loan with the institution. The past loan was indeed paid back.

Corn is the crop grown by DOULAYE, who is standing second from the right in the photo. With his loan, he intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds and to pay for plowing to make use of 1.5 hectares.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to men and women customers in the city of BOUGOUNI. He plans on making a profit of 200,000 francs CFA per planting. The profit will enable him to pay back the loan and help cover the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to pay for farm inputs and plowing for planting crops

loans.name: Sinignessigui Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  SINIGNESSIGUI   est constitué    de 8 hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 48 ans, 4 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles polygames à DIOUTIEBOUGOU, un des un des villages de BOUGOUNI  de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles hivernale. 
Elles sont à leur 4eme prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé a été bien remboursé.
Le maïs  est la spéculation cultivée par  BROULAYE, le 2 eme  debout   dans la photo de la gauche  vers la droite.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour exploiter  3 hectares. 
La production sera vendue au niveau de la ville de BOUGOUNI, au marché, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Il  compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 275.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de rembourser son prêt et  d’aider  dans les dépenses quotidiennes de leur menage.
texts.en:
The group "SINIGNESSIGUI" is composed of eight married men averaging 48 years of age and four children each, all living in polygamous families in DIOUTIEBOUGOU, a village in BOUGOUNI (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The men are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their rainy season farm work. They are on their fourth loan with the institution. The past loan was indeed paid back.

Corn is the crop grown by BROULAYE, who is standing second from the left in the photo. With his loan, he intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds and to pay for plowing to make use of 3 hectares.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to men and women customers in the city of BOUGOUNI. He plans on making a profit of 275,000 francs CFA per planting. The profit will enable him to pay back the loan and help cover the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to pay for farm inputs and plowing for planting crops

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a 40 year old retail shop owner in Mishomuhoroni Mombasa. He is a married man who supports three children. Anthony's wife is a housewife. 

Anthony has been operating his business for the last four years and it has been doing well.

This is his first loan from KADET Ltd, to finance his business. He will use the loan to purchase stock of milk in wholesale and supply to his environs. He will use the anticipated profit to open up a milk depot in Mishomuhoroni and service his loan. He hopes to have an expanded business and increased savings in future.

loans.use: to purchase stock of milk and supply as wholesaler.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married and has four children. Josephine is 56 years old and resides at Bunawan, Calamba.

Josephine owns farm land, planting and harvesting corn for sale and it is their main source of income. Each month, she earns 5,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) doing this type of business. Aside from farming, she also has a retail business selling goods in the community.

She requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase goods like milk, sugar, sardines and spices. In 2010, Josephine joined GDMPC. In the future, Josephine wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase goods like milk, sugar, sardines and spices

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a 24-year-old greengrocer and retailer of detergent in Kisauni, Mombasa. He is a single man, so he does not support anyone at the moment. He has been in this business for the last four years and is doing great.

This is his second loan from KADET Ltd to finance his business. He will use the loan to buy liquid detergent and fruit and vegetables for his store, and he will use the anticipated profit to service his loan and expand his business. He hopes to succeed in life and in business.

loans.use: to purchase liquid washing detergents and fruit and vegetables for his grocery.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
From Nyandarua South, Ruth is a 30-year-old married mother of five children between the ages of 15 and 1. For the past five years Ruth has been operating a quarry business and is now requesting her second loan from KADET Ltd to enable her to buy tools to use in her quarry. She is optimistic that her business will do better after the loan.

Ruth hopes to expand her enterprise in the near future.

loans.use: To buy tools for use in her quarry

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.en: Edilberto is a single entrepreneur who lives in Batoo, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. He has been running his sari sari (variety) store for more than five years and earns about 5,000 PHP a month for a living. As a new member of Gata Daku MPC, he borrowed a loan to buy rice and feeds in addition to his usual offerings. He plans to renovate his store with his generated income. He hopes to have better living conditions in the near future.

loans.use: to buy rice and feeds in addition to his usual offerings.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children who are in school, Gemma works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane. Gemma is borrowing 12,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requesting a new loan to further build her food vending and farming sugarcane business.

Gemma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her food production

loans.name: 4000 Mbarete Group

texts.es:
El comité  se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad de Colonia Mbarete. Son mujeres con ganas de salir adelante. Son de una colonia lejana de la ciudad de Santaní, de difícil acceso, eminentemente rural. Todas las integrantes se dedican a la cría, venta o faena de animales de corral, con lo que ayudan a sus familias a ir mejorando.
Una de ellas es Sebastiana, quien es la presidenta, comenta que ellas se ayudan y se esfuerzan por poder dar cada una a su familia lo que necesitan. Solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales y así seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: The communal bank comprises neighbors from Colonia Mbarete. The women, who want to be successful, live in a rural, hard-to-access area outside the city of Santaní. The members raise and sell farm animals to help their families get ahead. Sebastiana, who is one of the members and president of the group, says that the women support each other and work hard each day to provide for their families. She has applied for a loan to buy nutritious animal feed to continue the work she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy nutritious animal feed.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita runs a general store in the village of Bato, Plaridel, to make a living. She is 52 and is married with one child. Her husband is a farmer, and she helps to generate income with her sari sari (general) store. She has been in this business for more than six years. 

She has taken a loan from Gata Daku MPC in order to purchase canned goods, milk, sugar and coffee for her store. She plans to use the generated revenue as additional capital for her business.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, milk, sugar and coffee for her store

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy an additional stock of spices, meat, vegetables, etc. for her food vending business.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 18 years. Jocelyn earns additional income from raising livestock.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional stock of spices, meat, vegetables, etc. for her business

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 19-year-old single man. He has been working in the construction field since 2011. He got involved in this type of business at a very young age in order to provide extra financial support for the family. He is specialized in placing paves. He works with great professionalism and has one part-time employee helping him with the work.  Today, he is requesting to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a winch for his business so as to proceed with his operations properly. Mohamad plans to let his employee work on a full-time basis as he is sure that he will be able to significantly expand his business and increase its capital thanks to the loan.

loans.use: purchase a winch

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 26 años vive con sus padres y hermanos, trabaja por el día y por la noche va a la Facultad, está cursando el último año de la carrera de Ingeniería en Marketing, una vez  que termine su carrera quiere seguir trabajando y así ayudar a su familia.
Quiere ser una buena profesional, con conocimientos, que sirva para poder ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan. También quiere seguir creciendo como estudiante y profesional.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus gastos de titulación, ya que son muchas las gestiones que tiene que cubrir.
texts.en:
Sonia is 26 years old and lives with her parents and siblings. She works during the day and attends higher education in the evenings. She is in the last year of her Marketing studies, and once she finishes she wants to continue working in order to help her family.

She wants to be a good professional and possess knowledge that will allow her to help people who need it. She also wants to continue developing as a student and professional. 

She is applying for this loan in order to pay for her studies, since there are a lot of expenses related to this that she needs to pay for.

loans.use: to pay for her studies

loans.name: Decisiones Group

texts.es:
Decisiones se formo con la unión de varias vecinas de la Ciudad de Santani, ellas son mujeres luchadoras, que vieron una gran oportunidad de crecimiento en el programa de mujeres emprendedoras, y de esa forma dar cada una a su familia lo que necesitan.
La Sra. Leocadia, una de las integrantes se dedica a la cría de chancho y faena y vende en su despensa. Es una señora muy emprendedora y muy necesitada del crédito es por eso que lo solicita, para poder invertirlo en la compra de otros insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, enlatados y demás, que le serán de mucha ayuda en su negocio.
texts.en:
“Decisiones” was formed by various residents from the City of Santani.  They are hardworking women who saw a great opportunity for growing the Women Entrepreneurs program and providing their families with what they need.

Leocadia is one of the members.  She raises pigs and vegetables, which she sells in her food store, and is an enterprising woman who really needs this loan, so she is requesting it to buy other supplies for her store, such as vegetables, fruits, canned goods, and other things that will be very helpful to her business.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Joelyn

texts.en:
Joelyn is 50 years old and married, with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 17 years and also earns income from selling ready-to-wear clothes and from pig fattening.

Jocelyn has requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional products like shampoo, soap, soft drinks, noodles, and eggs to sell. Joelyn has borrowed and repaid 25 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Jocelyn aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like shampoo, soap, soft drinks, noodles, and eggs to sell

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a 48-year-old landlord in Kilifi, Kenya. He is  married and supports five members of his family; his wife provides additional income. Samuel has been in this business for the last twenty years and has been doing well.

This marks his third loan from KADET Ltd, to expand his rental houses and renovate the weak ones to earn him more income. Samuel intends to use the loan to purchase cement, sand and paint, and in turn will use the gains to service his loan and educate his children. He hopes to own more properties in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and paint to renovate his rental property

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 21-year-old married man living with his wife and only child. Regardless of his young age, Ahmad works really hard in order to earn a good income as he is the main income source of the family. He started to work very early and was able to build a good business reputation in the plumbing business. He works on a freelance basis responding to any customer’s demands. With his youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, he will purchase metal supplies and machinery needed that will help him improve his repairing skills. In the future, Ahmad plans to become the proprietor of his own shop.

loans.use: purchase metal supplies and machinery needed

loans.name: Romanda

texts.en:
Romanda is a 38-year-old, married mother of two. For 25 years, she has been working to bake special, traditional Manakish (a folded dough, with several tasty toppings on it, such as cheese or thyme, served for breakfast mainly, but can be taken at anytime during the day). Thirteen years ago, this extensive experience helped Romanda to start to help her husband in improving their business and increasing their income.

Romanda is applying for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development, to increase her funds for buying flour and to pay for her husband's driver's license expenses. This license will help them buy and transport their business products and family needs in a less expensive way.

Romanda hopes to keep on expanding her business in a well-managed way and to open a larger bakery in the future.

loans.use: to increase her funds for buying flour and to pay for her husband's driver's license expenses.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: Beatriz, a sus 51 años de edad es casada y madre de 3 hijos. Desde pequeña ha tenido un gusto particular por los animales, especialmente por las aves, razón por la cual, hace 3 años con el apoyo de su esposo comenzó a criar aves como periquitos, cinzontes, entre otros y logró tener una muy buena cantidad de animales, hasta el punto de abrir las puertas de su casa para exhibirlas y, para obtener recursos cobrara la entrada a ver la exhibición, siendo sus principales clientes  los estudiantes de varios colegios y escuelas del sector; así generaba ingresos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar. Beatriz es una mujer emprendedora e innovadora, siempre va en busca de opciones que le permitan progresar, por esta razón solicita el crédito que será invertido en la compra de jaulas grandes que van desde el piso hasta la altura del techo y comprar el alimento para continuar con el cuidado y cría de todas sus aves, de esta manera podrá tener disponibilidad suficiente para vender y así generar mejores utilidades. Ella sueña con tener los recursos suficientes para construir un nivel más en su casa, bien ventilado e iluminado para tener allí a sus animales que sea un punto estratégico de exhibición y venta, así mejorará su nivel de ingresos y podrá ofrecer a su familia una muy buena calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Beatriz, 51, is married and mother of three children. Since she was little she’s particularly loved animals, especially birds, which is why three years ago with support from her husband she started raising birds like parakeets and mockingbirds, among others and she succeeded in obtaining a good number of animals to the extent that she opened the doors of her house to display them and to earn income she’d charge admission to see the exhibition.  Her main customers were students from various secondary and primary schools in the sector.  She generated income this way to support her home.

Beatriz is a very enterprising, innovative woman who always seeks ways to make progress.  Because of this she’s requesting a loan to buy large bird cages that extend from floor level to the ceiling and to buy feed to continue caring for and raising birds in order to have enough to sell and generate higher profits.

She dreams with having sufficient resources to build another well-ventilated, lighted level onto her house so that she can have more animals in a strategic location to be displayed and sold.  In this way her income level will improve and she will be able to offer her family very good quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy large bird cages and bird feed.

loans.name: Akhtar

texts.en: Akhtar is a 52-year-old married woman and the mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Akhtar’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Akhtar has applied for a loan of PKR 35,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service for his passengers. Akhtar is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 51 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Josephine is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy additional feed for her pigs.

Josephine has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane and a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Mujeres Para El Desarrollo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres para el desarrollo está en su ciclo número 23 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder seguir ayudando a sus familias como lo vienen haciendo, y para conocer la situación de cada una.
Cristina es una de ellas, realmente una persona digna de destacar por la gran ayuda y motivación que siempre tiene. Lucha por su familia y por ir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia. Ella se dedica a hacer y vender todo tipo de comestibles en lo que le está yendo muy bien pues tiene muy buena clientela. Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, carnes, condimentos y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo las comidas que vende y deleitar así a sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad que reciben pues les será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The group called “Mujeres Para el Desarrollo” (Women for Development) is in cycle #23 in the women’s committee program; they all work and help each other to get ahead.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey to continue helping their families like they’ve been doing and to get to know each one of their situations.

Cristina is one of them.  She’s really a person worthy of note for the great help and motivation she always has.  She strives for her family and to gradually improve their living conditions.  She works making and selling all types of food and is doing very well because she has a very god clientele.

She’s requesting this loan to be able to buy vegetables, meats, condiments and other supplies needed to continue making the meals she sells and to please her customers.  She is grateful for this opportunity she’s getting because it will be of much help to her.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat and condiments.

loans.name: Hitaf

texts.en:
Hitaf is a 48-year-old married mother of two children. She has been working as a tutor for four years to help her beloved husband cover their family's expenses. Her business is home-based and located next to a private school. Most of her students come directly after school to acquire a better education.

She is applying for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to make necessary changes in her house to keep it a healthy place to live. Hitaf is working hard to save enough money to open a professional kindergarten, and to babysit customers' children as an additional income business, which will be based outside her house.

loans.use: To make necessary changes at her house to keep it a healthy place to live.

loans.name: Benkadi Iii Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  BENKADI III    est constitué 8   de femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  43 ans, 5  enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à  M’PIAKALA, un des villages de BOUGOUNI, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles hivernale. 
Elles sont à leur 9eme  prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
L’arachide  est la spéculation cultivée par  CHATA    la 2ème femme       debout de la droite vers la gauche.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour exploiter  2 hectares. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à BOUGOUNI, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de  110 000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de rembourser son prêt et  d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de leur ménage.
texts.en:
The group "BENKADI III" is composed of eight married women averaging 43 years of age and five children each, all living in polygamous families in M’PIAKALA, a village in BOUGOUNI (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their rainy season farm work. They are on their ninth loan with the institution. The past loans were indeed paid back.

Peanuts is the crop grown by CHATA, who is standing second from the right. With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds and to pay for plowing to make use of 2 hectares.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to men and women customers in the village and in BOUGOUNI. She plans on making a profit of 110,000 francs CFA per planting. The profit will enable her to pay back the loan and help her husband to cover the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to pay for farm inputs and plowing for planting crops

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Eva works hard to support her family.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and from farming rice. Eva is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials like thread, needles, and other supplies for her tailoring business.

Eva has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like thread, needles, and other supplies for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Arimae Community

texts.en:
The village of Arimae is applying for its second loan to expand plantain production in their community. Plantains are a staple food crop in Panama, and also one of the main income-producing activities for Indigenous communities. Arimae is an 800-person Emberá and Wounaan indigenous community in Panama’s Darien province. They will use the $10,000 loan to buy plantain seed stock to incubate in the nursery, as seen in the photo. The loan will also cover costs for planting, maintaining, and harvesting the plantains. With the proceeds from the harvests the village will finance community development projects and support legal efforts to secure their reservation.

Otilio is currently one of the caciques, or chiefs, for the community, and is a part of one of the founding members of the community of Arimae, which was formally founded in the 1970's to help defend the community's land from illegal loggers and cattle ranchers. 

The residents of Arimae are ancestors of the Chocó people who migrated from the Chocó region of Colombia during the 16th century, and subsisted for generations as hunter-gatherers and fishermen. Today, the community members depend mostly on subsistence agriculture and day labor to put food on the table. Arimae is part of a network of indigenous reservations that once stretched for hundreds of thousands of hectares in the Darien. Over the past 30 years however, their land holdings have declined sharply as illegal logger and cattle ranchers encroach into their reservation in search of timber and pastureland.

loans.use: To pay for agriculture supplies and technical assistance for a plantain project.

loans.name: Gertrude

texts.fr: Gertrude est une femme de 38 ans et mère vde 08 enfants dont l'âge verie entre 01 et 23 ans. elle fait dans la vente des vivres (maccabos) dans un marché de la place depuis sept ans. son stock de vivres étant limité,elle réalise très peu de bénéfices. ce qui ne lui permet pas de s'épanouir. raison pour laquelle elle sollicite un crédit pour diversifier sa marchandise en achetant d'autres vivres comme les régimes de plantain,et augmenter la quantité de filets de maccabos. elle compte réinvestir en partie les bénéfices qui en résulteront et assurer la scolarité,la santé de sa famille.
texts.en: Gertrude is a 38-year-old woman who is a mother of eight children, from 1 to 23 years old. She has been selling staple foods ('maccabos', a kind of root vegetable) at a local market for seven years. Since her stock of goods is limited, she makes little in profit, and this holds her back from success. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to diversify her merchandise by purchasing more staple foods, such as bunches of plantains, and by obtaining more bags of maccabos. She plans on reinvesting part of the resulting profits and ensuring that her family's healthcare and schooling costs are covered.

loans.use: to diversify her merchandise, staple foods such plantains

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.en: Tahmina is 32 years old and works from home as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for 15 years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Tahmina was not earning anything, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner as her husband was the sole bread winner of the family. Her hard work helped her establish a good clientele but she is having difficulty fulfilling large orders. She requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to buy spools of thread in different colors along with packs of buttons, needles and elastic material. She is very experienced in her business and confident that her business will move in a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors along with packs of buttons, needles and elastic material.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Divino Niño Jesús está en su ciclo número 13° del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde17 mujeres se encontraban por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lidia, quien en su última encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, es decir con buenos ingresos, pero a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total, ya que con ello podrá dar un mejor bienestar a su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace como la venta de minutas y bebidas, también se debe destacar que está poniendo todo de si por ir mejorando.
La Sra. Lidia Solicita de este crédito para la compra de sus insumos para hacer sus comestibles, como ser verduras, carne, bebidas, pan, otros el cual la ayudara a mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This group, called Divino Niño Jesús, is in its 13th loan cycle with the women's committee program, where everybody help each other to move forward. The group is participating in a survey that aims to eliminate poverty, and the results shows that 17 women find themselves below the poverty line, i.e. have very low incomes.

One of the group's members is Lidia, who landed on poverty level three in the last survey, which means she has a good income thanks to her hard effort, persistent work, and the personal qualities associated with a successful woman. She is improving her poverty status, but at the same time she is aware of the fact that the work and effort she is doing has to continue permanently in order for her to succeed in improving her family's well-being. It should be emphasized that she is putting all her effort into improving her foods and beverages business. 

Lidia is applying for this loan in order to buy inputs for elaborating her foods, such as vegetables, meat, beverages, bread, and more. The loan will help her to improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, beverages, bread, and more

loans.name: Reina De La Paz Group

texts.es:
El comité “Reina de la Paz” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mbutuy. Trabajan en conjunto para ayudarse  y cada una de ellas saca el monto de acuerdo a la necesidad de invertir y la capacidad de pago. La Sra. María tiene una casilla y vende todo tipo de comidas.
Ella es de una comunidad alejada, de difícil acceso, que aun está en crecimiento, más bien rural. Comenta que se está esforzando por salir adelante e ir mejorando su vida y la de su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos, y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus comestibles y dando a su familia lo que necesita.
texts.en:
The “Reina de la Paz” committee was formed by various residents from the City of Mbutuy.  They work together to help one another and they all put in the agreed upon amount toward repayment.  Maria has a stall and sells all types of food.

She is from a distant community that is easy to get to and is growing.  It’s mainly rural.  She says that she is trying to get ahead and improver her family’s life.

She is asking for this loan so she can buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other supplies to be able to make her foods and provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Jetypeka Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Jetypeka”  está en su ciclo número 8º del programa de comité, donde cada una está esforzándose al máximo por poder ir mejorando sus vidas y las de sus familias por medio del trabajo en conjunto y la lucha del grupo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rocio quien lucha y trata de día a día ir dando todo de si para que a su familia no les falta nada. Ella vende ropas y calzados, también se debe destacar el trabajo y esfuerzo que ella hace, ya que aunque llueva, o haga mucho calor siempre está ahí trabajando duro.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de ropa y calzados de temporada lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called “Jetypeka” is in cycle #8 in the committee program; each one of them is striving to the maximum degree to gradually improve her and her family’s life by means of teamwork and group struggle.

One of the members is Rocío who strives day to day to give her all so that her family will have everything they need.  She sells clothes and shoes and the effort and work she does should also be pointed out because she’s always out there working hard if it’s raining or if it’s very hot.

She’s asking for this loan to buy seasonal clothes and shoes which will help her fulfill her business plan that will help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Dodo

texts.fr: Dodo âgé de 25ans vit à Lomé et n'a pas d'enfant en charge. il a appris la mécanique et ouvert son atelier en 2010. Son travail consiste à acheter des voitures pas en bon état pour casser et revendre les différentes pièces. Il espère avec le profit tiré de son premier prêt agrandir son secteur d'activité et se lancer plus tard dans la vie maritale.
texts.en: Dodo, aged 25, lives in Lomé and has no children to support. He learned to be a mechanic and opened his workshop in 2010. His work involves purchasing automobiles in poor shape to disassemble in order to resell the different parts. He hopes to use the profits earned from his first loan to expand his business sector and begin a life in marriage.

loans.use: to purchase automobiles to disassemble

loans.name: Richie

texts.en:
Richie is 32 years old and married with two children. She lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. Her husband is a fisherman selling fish to earn a living. She owns and operates a banana production business for their main source of income. 

She joined GDMPC in 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure for banana production. Her hopes and dreams are to improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Dovi

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter des ingrédients pour son restaurant, madame Dovi demande un premier crédit pour s'approvisionner en marchandises. Elle revend du riz dans un établissement de la place. Elle espère réinvestir dans l'activité et assurer un avenir radieux à la famille(mariée à un transitaire, ils ont 03 enfants de 11,08 et 04ans qui sont scolarisés).
texts.en: To purchase ingredients for her restaurant, Ms. Dovi is asking for an initial loan to stock up on supplies. She sells rice at a local establishment. She hopes to reinvest in her work and ensure a bright future for her family. (Married to a shipping agent, she has three children, aged 11, 8 and 4 years old who are in school.)

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her restaurant

loans.name: Zuleima Alexandra

texts.es: Alexandra, a sus 39 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su pequeño hijo. Ha tenido experiencia laboral como vendedora en diversos almacenes del municipio donde reside, con lo cual generó ingresos para apoyar el sostenimiento de su hogar durante varios años. Es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y muy activa, pero por falta de oportunidades laborales no le ha sido posible emplearse, razón por la cual decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio, para lograrlo, solicita el crédito con el fin de adecuar un espacio de su casa para comenzar su propia sala de belleza, y requiere comprar activos fijos (sillas de peluquería, espejos, tocador, secador, plancha) e insumos al por mayor (shampoo, acondicionador, tratamientos capilares) con lo que podrá ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes y aprovechar la experiencia que ha obtenido realizando el servicio a domicilio. Esto le permitirá tener una estabilidad económica adecuada para sacar adelante a su hijo y aportar los recursos para el sostenimiento del hogar; además quiere comenzar a ahorrar para cumplir su principal sueño, de hacer crecer su negocio, acreditarlo y prestando un excelente servicio para que sea reconocido, así mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia y le brindará a su hijo una excelente educación.
texts.en: Alexandra, who is 39 years old, lives with her husband and her young son.  She has had work experience as a salesperson in various grocery stores in the municipality she lives in, which allowed her to generate income to support her household for several years.  She is an enterprising, hardworking, and very active woman, but a lack of job opportunities made it impossible for her to find employment.  For this reason, she decided to go out on her own and start her own business.  To achieve this, she is asking for this loan to outfit a space in her home to start her own beauty salon and she needs to buy fixed assets (styling chairs, mirrors, a station, a dryer, a straightening iron) and bulk supplies (shampoo, conditioner, hair treatments) so she can offer her clients good service and take advantage of the experience she has acquired carrying out this service at home. This will give her the financial stability she needs to get her son ahead and to provide the resources to support her household.  Thus, she will improve her family's quality of life and offer her son an excellent education.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets (styling chairs, mirrors, a station, a dryer, a flat iron) and bulk supplies (shampoo, conditioner, hair treatments)

loans.name: Hugo De Jesús

texts.es: Hugo a sus 43 años de edad es casado y padre de 4 hijos. Se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que comenzó su vida productiva, gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre y, actualmente posee cultivos de tomate de árbol, además alterna la actividad con la producción de leche contando con 10 vacas productoras de leche, cuyo producto es vendido a una de las empresas más grandes del sector lechero en el país, con esto ha logrado obtener los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia durante muchos años. Hugo es un hombre emprendedor, organizado, pujante y dedicado a su familia y a sus labores; día a día sobrepasa los obstáculos que se le presentan como los altos precios de los productos veterinarios y los insumos agrícolas, sumándole el bajo precio de venta de la leche. Por eso se motiva a solicitar crédito como apoyo, para invertirlo en la compra de 2 vacas productoras de leche, con lo cual podrá aumentar su producción y por ende los ingresos que recibe por venta del líquido. Hugo sueña con darle continuidad a sus negocios y para ello se proyecta teniendo como mínimo 20 vacas lecheras; de esta manera podrá tener una estabilidad económica favorable para brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una excelente educación a sus 4 hijos.
texts.en:
Hugo is 43 years old, married, and the father of four children. He has been working in agriculture since the beginning of his productive life, thanks to his father’s teachings. Currently, he has tree tomato crops. In addition, he alternates that activity with milk production. He has ten dairy cows whose product is sold to one of the largest companies in the dairy sector in the country. With this, he has managed to obtain the income needed to sustain his family for many years.

Hugo is an enterprising, organized, and strong man and he is devoted to his family and his work. Everyday, he overcomes obstacles presented to him such as the high price of veterinary products and agriculture supplies, adding to that the low price of milk. That is why he is motivated to request a loan as support to use in the purchase of two dairy cows, with which he can increase production and consequently, the income received from milk sales. 

Hugo dreams of giving continuity to his businesses. For that to happen, it is projected that he should have at least a minimum of 20 dairy cows. In this way, he will have favorable economic stability in order to give his family a better quality of life and an excellent education to his four children.

loans.use: to buy 2 diary cows.

loans.name: Artesanas De Potrero Poli Group

texts.es:
Las 14 integrantes de este comité cuentan con actividades variadas, cada una de ellas invierten ponen su mejor esfuerzo para el sustento de sus negocios y bienestar familiar. Las Señoras están muy agradecidas con Fundación paraguaya por el gran apoyo que les brinda otra por medio del programa y las capacitaciones.
La señora Rocío es la presidenta del comité, ella invierte su crédito en compra de telas, alambres, y canastitas para la elaboración de flores artificiales, ya que por medio de su trabajo y esfuerzo está saliendo adelante.
Rocio es una mujer muy sacrificada, que sabe que la única forma de poder seguir creciendo es dando todo de su para ayudar a su familia. Agradece por esta oportunidad que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The 14 members of this committee carry out a variety of activities.  Each one of them puts her best effort into maintaining her business and family well-being.  The ladies are very grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the great support it provides them by means of the program and the training.

Rocío is committee president.  She will use her loan to buy fabric, wire and little baskets to make artificial flowers since through her effort and work she’s getting ahead.

Rocío is a very self-sacrificing woman who knows that the only way to continue growing is giving her all to help her family.  She’s grateful for this opportunity that will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy fabric, wire and baskets.

loans.name: Charles

texts.fr: Marié à une infirmière et papa d'un adorable enfant de 18 mois, Mr Charles revend depuis 2010 des matériaux d'électricité à touts personnes dans une boutique. N'arrivant plus à répondre aux besoins de ses derniers à cause du manque de marchandises, elle sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour s'approvisionner en marchandises. il espère à l'avenir ouvrir une autre boutique et bien entretenir sa famille.
texts.en: Married to a nurse, Mr. Charles is a dad with an adorable 18-month-old child. He has been selling electrical goods since 2010 to all comers to his shop. No longer able to respond to their needs due to a lack of merchandise, he is requesting his first WAGES loan to stock up on merchandise. For the future, he hopes to open another shop and to take good care of his family.

loans.use: to purchase electrical goods to sell

loans.name: Hosea

texts.en:
Hosea, 31 years old, is from Nyahururu. He is married to Rahab and he has three children who are 9, 7 and 5 years old.

He is a motorcycle operator and he has been in this business for the past six years. Hosea has applied for his second loan from KADET after successfully paying back his previous loan. He has plans to use this loan to buy a motorcycle.

His hopes and dreams for his business and family are to do modern farming and have improved living standards.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Yasmin

texts.en: Yasmin is a 44-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Sixteen years ago she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy thread in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and lace to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenue to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy thread in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and lace.

loans.name: Grupo Lalumu Group

texts.en: Natalia is one of the members of Lalumu Group and the word "Natalia" in a local language means" Hope." She is taking the loan to add more to her own working capital in order to buy some additional supplies such as coconut and grating tools. She is a hardworking woman. She started her business in 2006 with her own working capital of 50 dollars. She has four children, two of whom are in school. She is happy with this loan offered for poor people to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy coconut and grating tools

loans.name: Alejandro Josue

texts.es: El joven Alejandro tiene 24 años de edad, es soltero de escasos recursos economicos, estudia la carrera de Lic. en Química y Farmacia, en la actualidad labora como auxiliar de farmacia su tía le ayuda con los gastos universitarios ya que sus ingresos son muy pocos. Solicita el crédito para pagar el curso de titulación de su carrera, que con muchos esfuerzos esta por culminar,
texts.en: Young Alejandro is 24 years old.  He is single and does not have much money.  He is studying for a degree in chemistry and pharmaceutical sciences.  He is currently working as an assistant at a pharmacy.  His aunt is helping him with his university expenses as he has such little income.  He is asking for this loan to pay for the qualifying course for his degree, as he is working very hard to finish.

loans.use: to pay for his qualifying course

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel tiene 51 años de edad, es casado.  es una persona humilde y trabajadora que se dedica a cultivar maíz, frijol y sorgo aprendió esta labor desde muy pequeño con su padre ya que es el mayor de sus hermanos recuerda que su padre le compro una Cuma para llevarlo y enseñarle a limpiar la milpa madrugando y trabajando todos los días. Su padre le decía que era quien tenia que darle el ejemplo a sus hermanos por ser el mayor. Luego que decidió formar su propia familia se ha dedicado a cultivar granos básicos. 


El cliente compra sus insumos en el agro servicio que le dan mejor precio y productos de calidad que él necesita, para su cultivo que es desde la semilla, fertilizantes, y venenos para control de plagas y enfermedades de sus cultivos así plantar una buena milpa y obtener una buena producción en la cosecha. Y tiene que viajar en pick-up o en bus una distancia de 12 km para llegar hasta el lugar donde el cliente encuentra los productos que necesita.
 

El dinero de este crédito será destinado para la compra de insumos agrícolas comprar abono y sorgo para la siembra, también se va a comprar productos como fungicidas, insecticidas para control de plagas y enfermedades y herbicidas para el control de malezas del cultivo. Además se utilizara una parte del dinero para realizar el trabajo de preparación de terreno, siembra y fertilización de los cultivos plantados.


Él piensa en que después de pagar este crédito, sacar otro y destinarlo a la siguiente cosecha; pero después de cancelar este otro piensa crecer y sacar otro crédito y destinarlo a comprar una vaca que  se encuentre en producción de leche para tener parte de la alimentación para su familia.
texts.en:
Isabel is 51 years old and he is married.  He is a humble and hardworking person who grows corn, beans, and sorghum for a living.  He learned to do this work when he was very young with his father, as he is the eldest of his siblings.  He remembers that his father bought him a machete to show him how to clean the corn by getting up early and working every day.  His father decided he was the one who had to set an example for his siblings as he was the oldest.  After starting his own family, he has been working growing staple grains.

He buys his supplies at the farming supply and they give him a better price and the quality products he needs for his crop, such as seed, fertilizers, and chemicals to control pests and diseases in his crops, so he can plant a good cornfield and produce a good harvest.  He has to travel 12 km by bus or pick-up truck to get to the place where they have the products he needs.

The money from this loan is for the purchase of farming supplies.  It is to buy fertilizer and sorghum for planting.  He will also buy products, such as fungicides, insecticides to control pests and diseases, and herbicides to control weeds in his crop.  He will then use a part of the money to prepare his land and to plant and fertilize the crops he has planted. 

After repaying this loan, he is thinking about taking out another for the coming harvest.  Then, after repaying this other loan, he is thinking about growing and taking out another loan to buy a dairy cow to provide part of his family's diet.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, such as fertilizer and sorghum for planting, as well as products such as fungicides, insecticides for pests and disease, and herbicides to control weeds in his crops

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en: Sawsan is a 38-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and two children who are attending school. Her husband sells clothes and he represents the main income source of the family. As for her, she has been working as a tailor since 2006 in order to increase their finances and enhance the family’s way of living. Today, she is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a new tailoring machine that will help her increase her business productivity and therefore her revenues. In the future, she looks forward to requesting additional Kiva loans with the aim of developing her business even further.

loans.use: to purchase a new tailoring machine

loans.name: Daissi

texts.es:
Daissi es una estudiante de la ciudad de Carapeguá, está estudiando la carrera de Licenciatura En Ciencias y Técnico de Alimentos, lo que le permitirá el día de mañana ser una gran profesional.
Comenta que su meta es al terminar su carrera seguir estudiando y especializándose, ya que una persona nunca lo sabe todo y siempre se debe fomentar la formación en uno.
Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en los gastos de su titulación, ya que tiene que hacer muchas gestiones para cuando tenga que recibir su titulo y quiere poder cubrirlas. Esta agradecida por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Daissi is a student from the city of Carapeguá. She is studying for a degree in Food Science and Technology so that she can become a successful professional one day. Daissi says that her goal is to continue studying and specializing so that she can finish her degree. No one person knows everything, so she believes that one should always be encouraged to keep learning.

Today she is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the expenses related to her degree. She knows that there are many steps that are required before receiving a degree, so she wants to make sure that everything is covered. Daissi is grateful for the opportunity she has received since it will be of great help.

loans.use: to pay for the expenses related to her degree program.

loans.name: Jeanneth Alexandra

texts.es: Alexandra, a sus 20 años de edad es una mujer con visión, emprendedora y muy activa; por falta de experiencia laboral le ha sido difícil conseguir oportunidades de trabajo, por lo cual ha decidido iniciar su propio negocio de venta de mercancía y productos Amway, para lo cual requiere el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de surtido al por mayor (cremas corporales, productos de aseo personal, entre otros) con el fin de aprovechar los descuentos que le ofrecen y así tener variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes que inicialmente serían familiares, vecinos y amigos del sector y clientes de la sala de belleza que atiende su madre. Con esto podrá obtener ingresos para aportar al sustento de su hogar y podrá invertir más en su negocio así, podrá ir avanzando para convertirse en una líder del negocio, ser altamente productiva y muy competitiva a nivel comercial, así podrá mejorar su nivel de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en: At 20 years old, Alexandra is an enterprising, very active woman with vision.  She has had trouble finding work as she does not have much experience, so she has decided to start her own business selling Amway merchandise and products.  To do this she needs a loan to invest in buying stock wholesale (body creams and personal hygiene products, among others) so she can take advantage of the discounts they offer and to have a variety to offer her customers.  At first, these will be her family members, neighbors, friends from the neighborhood, and customers from her mother's beauty salon.  This will allow her to have an income to contribute to her household and she will be able to invest more in her business this way.  She will keep making progress to become a leader in this business; she will be highly productive and very competitive at the commercial level, which will improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock wholesale (body creams and personal hygiene products, among others) in order to take advantage of discounts offered

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en: Rosalie is happily married with three children. She lives in Bato, Plaridel with her family. She owns and manages a piggery raising pigs for sale. Her husband is a farmer planting corn and bananas to earn a living. She borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC to purchase fees and piglets to raise. She plans to expand her livestock shelter to be used for expansion. She is hopeful to gain more income and to have a better living condition in the future.

loans.use: to purchase feed and piglets to raise

loans.name: Ana Edelmira

texts.es:
Ana tiene 45 años de edad, es casada y madre de cinco hijos. se dedica a cuidar y dar educación a sus hijos y además ayuda a su esposo en las labores agrícolas; ya que tuvo que aprender a cultivar desde un día que su esposo emigro y tuvo que cultivar para cubrir las necesidades y obtener el sustento para sus hijos, a esta fecha ella solo le da apoyo a su esposo ya que el regreso hace unos años y se dedica a cultivar granos básicos para el sustento de su familia. Además, en verano se dedican a fabricar teja y venderla para obtener ingresos para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. 


Los materiales que utiliza para cultivar los obtiene comprándolos en un lugar en donde le dan mas baratos los insumos para la producción y para la temporada de verano obtienen los materiales para elaborar teja como lo es la tierra y  barro los adquiere  buscando en lugares cercanos donde se encuentre; ya que se necesita tener el conocimiento de las clase de tierra y barro buenas para tener una buena producción es por ello que su esposo se encarga de buscarlos y transportarlos en camión para el lugar donde se fabrican las tejas.

El dinero  de este crédito será destinado a la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y para la preparación de terreno donde se sembraran frijoles, otra parte del préstamo se destinara a la compra de algunos medicamentos para uno de sus hijos.


Ella pretende mejorar sus capacidades económicas, gracias al apoyo que hoy le brinda fundación campo, podrá cubrir las necesidades tanto de la milpa como de su hijo que necesita de medicinas para mejorar su salud, poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, mejor producción y mejorar así sus ingresos.

Ella planea que después de cancelar este crédito, dejar las puertas abiertas en la fundación para poder solventar cualquier otra necesidad crediticia cuando se necesite; como por ejemplo en verano poder sacar una buena producción de teja por medio del crédito.
texts.en:
Ana, 45, is married and mother of five children.  She works caring for and providing education for her children and also helps her husband with the agricultural tasks.  She had to learn how to work the land from the day her husband emigrated and she had to work the land in order to meet needs and get sustenance for her children.  At present, she only helps her husband since he has returned and for a few years has been growing basic grains for family sustenance.  Also, in summer they make clay tiles to sell to earn income to cover basic family needs.

She buys the materials she uses for the crops in a place where agricultural supplies are less expensive and for the summer they get the materials to make the clay tiles, soil and clay, by looking for them in nearby places where they are found since one must know the good kinds of soil and clay that are needed to have a good production.  This is why her husband takes care of looking for them and transporting them by truck to the place where they manufacture the tiles.

The money from this loan will be used to buy fertilizer for the corn crop and to prepare the soil where they plant beans.  Another part of the loan will be used to buy some medicine for one of her children.

She intends to improve her economic capacity thanks to the support Fundación Campo is giving her today.  She will be able to cover the needs both of the corn field and of her son who needs medicine to improve his health in order to improve her family’s living conditions and to improve production and improve her income.

Her plan once she pays off this loan is to keep the door to the Fundación open to be able to solve any credit need that might arise like for example in the summer to be able to produce a good tile production by means of a loan.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, to prepare the soil and to buy medicine for one of her children.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en: Farzana is a 37-year-old married woman. She has been selling milk for many years with the support of her husband who is also shown in the photo. They have three buffaloes and one cow in milk. They have become famous by providing good quality milk. They have five children and are motivated to provide them a beautiful life with a good education, food and clothing.  Currently, Farzana has applied for her second loan of Rs 30,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. With the loan, she hopes to increase her sales and wishes to spend part of her income on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 58 years old, married and a mother of four children. She operates a cafe in Malindi town and has been in the business for the last 15 years. She earns a monthly profit of 6,150 KES. She was introduced to KADET LTD by our credit officer and she is applying for her first loan of 20,000 KES. Beatrice intends to use the loan to add foodstuff such as cooking flour, cooking oil, cereals and items such as eating plates, tea cups, spoons and so on to her business. She will save the anticipated profit and help pay school fees for her children. In the future, Beatrice hopes to grow her cafe with a view of owning a well set up hotel in the area.

loans.use: To purchase additional foodstuff and other items for her cafe

loans.name: Geisel Maria

texts.es: Doña Geisel es origaria de la ciudad de Leon. Es de oficio comerciante, dueña de una pulperia. Ella esta agradecida con Kiva y MiCredito ya que su primer credito fue de mucha ayuda, logro surtir su pulperia, satisfacer a sus clientes y obtener mejores ingresos. Esta solicitando este nuevo credito para comprar Granos Basicos tales como: arroz, azucar, aceite y frijol. Su meta futuro es convertir su pulperia en una micelania para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Geisel’s from the city of León.  She’s a merchant and owns a grocery store.  She’s grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito because her first loan was of much help to her.  She succeeded in stocking her store to satisfy her customers and earn higher income.

This new loan request is to buy basic grains like rice, sugar, oil and beans.  Her future goal is to turn her grocery store into a general store to offer a wider variety of goods.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar and beans.

loans.name: Gricelda Janneth

texts.es:
Gricelda, tiene 42 años de edad y disfruta de dos hijos, los cuales están estudiando. Ella, se dedica a la venta de ropa, lo cual lo realiza de lunes a sábado y asimismo elabora  pupusas por la tarde, oficio que lo aprendió con un familiar, desde hace tres años desempeña el negocio.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar variedad de mercadería, tales como ropa para damas y niñas; esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener más ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer más el  negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Gricelda, 42, enjoys her two children who are attending school.  She works selling clothes Monday to Saturday and makes ‘pupusas’ [filled grilled corn cakes] in the evening, an occupation she learned from a family member; she’s been in business for three years.

The loan she’s requesting will allow her to buy a variety of merchandise like clothes for women and girls.  This investment will help her increase her stock inventory and earn higher income.  Her dream is to strengthen the business more and to provide better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, and sewing supplies

loans.name: René Alfredo

texts.es:
Rene es un hombre de 46 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos. Es un ejemplo a seguir, actualmente tiene empleo en la Policía Nacional Civil, pero eso no le impide trabajar en otros rubros como lo es la ganadería. Actualmente posee 2 vacas y quiere comprar 2 mas y así poco a poco tener muchas mas. Anteriormente saco el bachillerato agrícola y eso lo motivo a trabajar en en área pecuaria, ademas le gusta tener gallinas criollas donde su esposa le ayuda con la alimentación de ellas.

Los materiales como vitaminas y otros antibióticos que utiliza para el mantenimiento del ganado los compra en en la ciudad y  le toca trasportarse hasta el terreno donde tiene las vacas haciendo un tiempo máximo de 45 minutos en pick up.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar de 2 novillas. Para crecer su hato y se motive a seguir trabajando con lo que  le gusta hacer.

 Tendrá mas productos lácteos para sus clientes y así podrá tener mas ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de todos sus hijos; ya que tiene 2  estudiando.

Don Rene en un futuro se ve con mucho ganado y ademas quiere sembrar arboles frutales en su terreno por que su pasión por la agricultura es grande.
texts.en:
Rene is a 46 year-old man who is married and has 4 children.  He is a model to follow; he currently works in the National Civil Police, but that doesn't stop him from also doing other work, such as animal husbandry.  At this time he has 2 cows, and he wants to buy 2 more and then gradually increase his herd to a large number.  He previously obtained a degree in agriculture, and this motivated him to work in the area of livestock production.  In addition, he likes to have chickens since his wife can help with feeding them.

He buys the supplies he uses to care for his livestock, including vitamins and antibiotics, in the city.  He then transports them to the fields where he has the cows.  It takes a maximum of 45 minutes to make this trip. 

Rene is requesting a loan from Fundacion Campo to buy 2 heifers so that he can grow his herd.  He is motivated to continue in this line of work, which he enjoys.  As a result, he will have more dairy products for his customers, and so he will have more income to improve the lives of his children, because two of his children are in school.

In the future, Rene sees himself with a lot of cattle.  He also wants to plant fruit trees on his land, because he has a great passion for agriculture.

loans.use: to buy 2 heifers
